docs.lead_paragraph: A Room for Debate forum last week discussed the effectiveness of public campaigns to promote healthy eating and reduce obesity. Many readers wrote in about their own struggles with weight, what worked for them and how public policy might be changed to help Americans keep the pounds off. Here are excerpts from their comments.

headline.main: What It Takes to Fight Obesity

docs.abstract: Room for Debate readers on their struggles with weight and ways to keep the pounds off.
docs.snippet: Room for Debate readers on their struggles with weight and ways to keep the pounds off.
